## ReactSerializer.renderSpec() method

Receives the return value from toDOM defined in the node schema and transforms it into JSX

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static renderSpec(structure: DOMOutputSpec, wraps?: ReactNode): ReactNode;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  structure | <code>DOMOutputSpec</code> | The DOMOutput spec for the current node |
|  wraps | <code>ReactNode</code> | passed through any elements that this component should be parent of |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ReactNode`
